title: Accessing community cultural opportunities
content:
Scenario: Accessing community cultural opportunities
    Given the local theater offers sensory-friendly performances
    And Jordan loves musicals
    When Jordan attends a sensory-friendly show
    Then the personal_agent helps Jordan select and prepare for the show
    And the theater environment is adapted for accessibility (lights, volume)
    And Jordan can enjoy cultural experience without barriers
    And Jordan's cultural participation contributes to diverse audiences
    And the theater benefits from inclusive programming
    And Jordan experiences full community cultural citizenship
    And accessibility allows Jordan's flourishing and joy
